metadata.dcterms:title: Replication Data for: "Insights from micromechanical modeling of intact rock failure: Event characteristics, stress drops and force networks" by Mirko van der Baan and Drew Chorney, submitted to Journal of Geophysical Research: Solid Earth
metadata.dcterms:creator: van der Baan, Mirko
Chorney, Drew
metadata.dcterms:description: Replication Data for: "Insights from micromechanical modeling of intact rock failure: Event characteristics, stress drops and force networks" by Mirko van der Baan and Drew Chorney, submitted to Journal of Geophysical Research: Solid Earth. Data include: stress-strain curves, acoustic emission, moment tensors, b-values and force data.
